name: Gourmet Cookalong - A Community Cooking & Dining Experience
description:
Drawing inspiration from community dining and the pleasures of deep diving
into the art of cooking and dining well, this experience helps you engage all
five senses when you're in the kitchen. The caviar on the top is relishing a
wonderful meal that you, along with a bunch of people, will cook together.  
  
**_The theme of this cookalong is Neapolitan Pizza._**  

  * **The cookalong** : Learn to make and stretch the Pizza Dough, assemble the pizza with toppings, taste different cheeses and the house sauce. Learn how to use a wood fired oven to bake pizzas.
  * **The meal** : Virgin Mojito, the Pizza that you make, Dessert.

Note: The cookalong includes vegetarian and non-vegetarian meal options.

name: The Dawn of Dough - Exploring Breads from Around the World
description:
It all began thousands of years ago, when crushed grains mixed with water met
fire and the first flatbreads were born. In ancient Egypt, an accidental
fermentation led to fluffy loaves, turning bread into a staple of
civilization. From India’s tandoor to Greek clay ovens, baking soon became an
art form.

By the Middle Ages, bread fed both the masses and the elite, with hearty
loaves for everyday people and soft, rich breads for royal feasts. The
Industrial Revolution brought machines, transforming bread into a global
phenomenon.Today, bread is more than a food - it's culture on a plate. From
tangy sourdough to chewy naan and crusty baguette, every bite tells a story of
evolution, resilience, and creativity.

_**Step into the world of breads and learn the art of making piadina
sandwiches and hand-rolled bagels while exploring their rich histories.
Immerse yourself in the cultural journey of bread in this experience.**_  

_**Note: The experience includes only eggless options.**_

name: The Golden Shot - An Espresso Brewing Experience
description:
Switch from coffee enthusiast to aficionado in this unique coffee appreciation
experience. Delve into the world of coffee and discover the nuances of brewing
and tasting across different roast profiles.

Step behind the counter and learn to pull a great espresso shot. Discover what
sets great coffees apart as you explore grind sizes, brewing pressures, and
the art of espresso extraction. Get hands-on with professional gear and taste
the difference in every pour.

**Note: Each participant makes an espresso shot and creates latte art on their
Cappuccino**

name: Chocolate Wonderland - Bean-to-Bar Chocolate Making & Tasting
description:
Indulge in the world of premium couverture chocolates - the real deal - and
get hands on with the basics of artisanal chocolate making.

This delightful experience will have you indulge in premium chocolate sourced
from the best locations, and learn delectable chocolate recipes under the
guidance of expert chocolatiers.

name: Oasis Of Scents - Artisanal Perfume Making
description:
An ode to the masterful craft of perfume making and the country's best noses,
this experience will have you develop a discerning sense of smell, understand
the nuances of perfumery as a science and art, as well as how fragrances
passively contribute to our overall experiences to create a lasting memory.

_**The experience includes navigating through various fragrance notes to
formulate your own customised bottle of perfume, under the guidance of an
expert.**_

name: Hula Harmony - Explore Movement Through Hooping
description:
A toy that was once designed for recreation, hula hooping gradually took the
world by a storm, starting with the United States in the late 1950s. Today
hula hooping is not just a playful activity, but also a form of exercise and
artistic expression. A cultural phenomenon, influencing music, fashion, and
dance.

**_This experience will involve a guided introduction to hula hooping, tricks
and transitions and flow choreography through some fun activities!_**

name: Layers of Decadence - A Tiramisu Making Experience
description:
Tiramisu, meaning "pick me up" in Italian, was crafted to be as uplifting as
its name suggests. Some myths trace it back to the 17th century, when a
similar dessert called Duke’s Soup was made for Grand Duke Cosimo III de’
Medici, but the tiramisu we know today took shape much later.

Originally more of a custard than a cake, tiramisu evolved into its signature
layered form, with espresso-soaked biscuits and creamy mascarpone. Over the
years, it has become a global favourite, loved for its rich yet airy texture
and simple, no-bake process.

_**Join our Tiramisu Making Experience and master the art of crafting this
classic Italian dessert from scratch. Learn key techniques, from achieving the
perfect mascarpone texture to balancing flavors, and assemble your tiramisu
step by step. Take home your handcrafted treat to enjoy and share.**_  

_**Note: The experience includes egg/eggless options.**_
